issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `fallback`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow

issues.description:
Multiple sends exist in one transaction, try to isolate each external call into its own transaction. As external calls can fail accidentally or deliberately.
Consecutive calls: 
Call at address: 1917
Call at address: 1917
Call at address: 1812
issues.title: Multiple Calls

issues.description:
In the function `withdrawFundBeneficiary()` the following predictable state variables are used to determine Ether recipient:
- block.timestamp
issues.title: Dependence on predictable environment variable

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function withdrawFundBeneficiary(). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence
